message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand that $90 is a bit below my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $110, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $105. I can offer it to you for $102. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I can offer it to you for $100.50. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $99.50?
